column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=webanno.custom.Referent|entity|infstat
#T_RL=webanno.custom.Coref|type|BT_webanno.custom.Referent
#Text=Experience Heaven on Earth
#Text=Heaven can be a place on earth if you choose to see it .
#Text=Life is heaven by perspective and by the way we choose to see the world .
#Text=If our mental state of mind chooses a happy peaceful state
#Text=we can maintain a wealthy mind .
#Text=This can be done through many different methods .
#Text=As cliché and corny as it might sound we can also experience heaven through our six different senses .
#Text=But we must choose to use them wisely .
#Text=We can also experience a glimpse of actual heaven through out extrasensory perception .
#Text=Therefore by your choice heaven can be a state of mind in our material world and spiritual world .
#Text=Steps
#Text=Experience mindfulness and meditation classes .
#Text=Go out and get into nature as much as possible .
#Text=To embrace positivity we must also experience negativity .
#Text=Embrace bad times and acknowledge bad days .
#Text=Have an attitude of gratitude .
#Text=Love every quirk about yourself !
#Text=Explore your six senses .
#Text=Every sense we have has an impact on all our personal daily experiences .
#Text=Make sure you hear positive music and films .
#Text=Speak as many positive words as possible and make sure believe in the good in all situations .
#Text=Make sure you eat fantastic healthy food that makes you feel energetic and alive .
#Text=If your limited and ca n't afford certain food enjoy every bite and enjoy the taste .
#Text=Remain in the present moment and pay your full attention to the food your eating .
#Text=Whatever you smell around you could bring pleasant or unpleasant feelings .
#Text=The best part of being in heaven is being unaffected !
#Text=Or leaving the area with the bad smell as we normally would anyway .
#Text=The less reactive we become the more calm and peaceful we feel .
#Text=What we see is our world around us .
#Text=Good and bad experiences can occur on a daily basis .
#Text=We never have only good experiences but if we choose to see the light in every bad experience we feel calmer and naturally more in tune with peace .
#Text=Leave any bad experience behind and do n't think about it .
#Text=Touch is what creates bonding and even awareness .
#Text=We greet people with a handshake to make them aware of our presence .
#Text=We hug a friend or hold a lovers hand .
#Text=Every touch brings people together and creates more beauty for interaction .
#Text=Touch can also be harmful .
#Text=Someone can accidently knock your arm on the tube .
#Text=People hit each other in a fight .
#Text=Touch is powerful if you can find the beauty it in .
#Text=If you can maintain positivity in the worse of any scenario you can find heaven everywhere around you .
#Text=The sixth sense is the final extra sense where the spiritual realm is opened and connected into our earthly realm .
#Text=We can connect with spiritual beings from these other realms .
#Text=The heaven realm includes your guardian angel and all other angels .
#Text=We can contact our spirit guides through mediumship .
#Text=Depending on how in tune we are with our sixth sense determines if we will see our spirit guides and a vision of heaven .
#Text=Through practice we can see a new world .
#Text=We can connect with lost loved ones and heaven .
#Text=Be an indigo .
#Text=We are all different and we all experience the world differently .
#Text=If you can accept yourself and your individual identity
#Text=you will be happy to have experienced heaven inside yourself .
#Text=Remain true and do n't follow other people or trends if it doesnt make you happy !
#Text=It 's as simple as that !
#Text=Follow your own heart .
#Text=Tips
#Text=Remember to be patient as it might not happen over night !
#Text=Warnings
#Text=People might be spiteful and try to bring you down as some people do n't want to see other people happy !
